name: Менеджер/Старший менеджер (Оценка бизнеса)
description:
Приглашаем Менеджера/Старшего Менеджера в группу оценки бизнеса (Valuation&Economics, Deals) направления бизнес-консультирования PwC.

Отдел занимается оценкой бизнеса для различных целей: сделки M&A, выход компаний на IPO, реструктуризация бизнеса, привлечение финансирования. Основной продукт - финансовая модель, бизнес-план, отчет об оценке.

Отдел делится на несколько групп, которые работают с определенными индустриями: химия, нефтехимия, metals&mining, удобрения, электроэнергетика, нефтегаз; финансовые институты, ритейл, фарма; телеком, агро, леc, автомобильный сектор, логистика.

Услуги, предоставляемые группой:

  • Услуги по анализу стоимости бизнеса (и его долей) для целей сделок слияний и поглощений (M&A); привлечения акционерного/заемного финансирования; подготовки финансовой отчетности и т. д.;
  • Стратегическое и операционное финансовое моделирование;
  • Инвестиционный анализ, поддержку при разработке бизнес-планов;
  • Услуги по оценке нематериальных активов в т. ч. брендов и товарных знаков, патентов, ПО;
  • Поддержка аудиторских, M&A проектов, проектов стратегического консалтинга, проектов по расследованию корпоративных споров в части наших компетенций и экспертизы.

The opportunity:

PwC Russia’s Valuations & Economics team performs value analyses of business entities or stakes in businesses, intangible assets, real estate, machinery and equipment to address our clients’ requirements regarding mergers, acquisitions and disposals, reorganisations, financial reporting, strategic planning and other management decision-making.

Services provided by department:

  • Financial modelling: strategic modelling; corporate modelling; operational modeling
  • Mergers and Acquisitions Support
  • Business plan development
  • Business valuation services
  • Intangible Assets Valuation
  • Purchase Price Allocation services
  • Real Option Valuations
  • Fairness Opinions

Responsibilities:

As a Manager, you’ll work as part of a team of problem solvers with extensive consulting and industry experience, helping our clients solve their complex business issues from strategy to execution. Specific responsibilities include but are not limited to:

  • Establish effective working relationships directly with clients
  • Contribute to the development of your own and team’s technical acumen
  • Keep up to date with local and national business and economic issues
  • Be actively involved in business development activities to help identify and research opportunities on new/existing clients
  • Continue to develop internal relationships and your PwC brand

Education, experience and skills requirements:

  • Higher education (Russian or equivalent)
  • 5+ years work experience in business valuation projects / strategy projects / business plan development projects / strategic marketing;
  • Ongoing participation in and / or completion of one of the following professional qualifications is an advantage: ASA, RICS, ACCA, RSV (Russian statutory valuation certificates - SMAO, ROO)
  • Preparation proposals, presentations, information MEMO
  • Practical working knowledge of MS Excel and the ability to structure and build complex financial models / business plans
  • Knowledge of general valuation principles and standards, specifically IFRS, IVS
  • Strong numerical & financial analytical skills and knowledge
  • Russian – native/fluent, English – Upper-Intermediate (both oral and written)

Soft skills:

  • Ability to operate in multitask environment
  • Strong presentation skills
  • Availability for overtime work and tough deadlines
  • Willingness to travel (Russia and abroad)
  • Business writing skills (both in Russian and in English)

You will get:

  • Competitive salary
  • Broad career and professional development opportunities
  • An opportunity to take part in a variety of complex and innovative projects
  • Support in getting professional qualifications
  • Medical insurance (dental services are included)
  • Life insurance
  • Flexible approach to work schedule
  • Additional paid calendar days of vacation
